attributes.action: Stop MPs getting expenses for 2nd homes etc
attributes.additional_details: This saving could go towards our NHS . It is a scandal the amount of money given to MPs for expenses and buying second homes
attributes.background: I want the Westminster Govt to buy a hotel that can house the MPs while they are working in London instead of home.  They should have basic rooms with en suites they should have meal vouchers and no expenses for staying over.  Too long they have been claiming for second homes and utilities.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
